pepc-b/error_test.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =========================
00002 !
00003 !  Estimate force errors
00004 !
00005 !  =========================
00006 
00007       subroutine error_test(ntest)
00008 
00009       use physvars
00010       use treevars
00011       use utils
00012       implicit none
00013 !      integer, parameter :: ntest = 3
00014       integer, intent(in) ::  ntest
00015       integer :: listerr(ntest)
00016       real*8, dimension(ntest) ::  potd, exd, eyd, ezd
00017       real*8 :: dfx2, dfy2, dfz2, fxs, fys, fzs, dpot, spot
00018       real*8 :: errfx, errfy, errfz, errf_ave, err_pot
00019       integer :: i, iseed = -317, isamp
00020 
00021 
00022 ! direct force evaluation
00023 ! TODO: make random list of particles for sample
00024 
00025       do i=1,ntest
00026          isamp = npp*rano(iseed)+1
00027          listerr(i) = isamp
00028 
00029       end do
00030 
00031 ! Get direct forces, potential
00032       call force_direct(npp,ntest,x(1:npp),y(1:npp),z(1:npp),q(1:npp),listerr(1:ntest),eps,force_const,exd,eyd,ezd,potd)
00033 
00034 ! find rms error
00035 
00036       dfx2 = 0.
00037       dfy2 = 0.
00038       dfz2 = 0.
00039       fxs = 0.
00040       fys = 0.
00041       fzs = 0.
00042       dpot=0.
00043       spot=0.
00044 
00045       do i=1,ntest
00046         dfx2 = dfx2 + (exd(i) - ex(listerr(i)))**2
00047         dfy2 = dfy2 + (eyd(i) - ey(listerr(i)))**2
00048         dfz2 = dfz2 + (ezd(i) - ez(listerr(i)))**2
00049         dpot = dpot + (potd(i) - pot(listerr(i)))**2
00050         spot = spot+ potd(i)**2
00051         fxs = fxs + exd(i)**2
00052         fys = fys + eyd(i)**2
00053         fzs = fzs + ezd(i)**2
00054       end do
00055 
00056       open(60,file='forces.dat')
00057       write (*,*) 'Writing forces, potentials to forces.dat'
00058       write (60,*) '    i     list    pot_tree       pot_direct       ex_tree       ex_direct', &
00059         '   ey_tree        ey_direct       ez_tree        ez_direct'
00060       write (60,'((2i8,8(1pe14.4)))') (i,listerr(i),pot(listerr(i)),potd(i), &
00061         ex(listerr(i)),exd(i), ey(listerr(i)), eyd(i), ez(listerr(i)), ezd(i), i=1,ntest)
00062 
00063       err_pot = sqrt(dpot/spot)
00064       errfx = sqrt(dfx2/fxs)
00065       errfy = sqrt(dfy2/fys)
00066       errfz = sqrt(dfz2/fzs)
00067       errf_ave = (errfx+errfy+errfz)/3.
00068       write (6,'(a/a20,1pe13.6/a20,3(1pe13.6)/a20,1pe13.6)') 'Relative rms errors:','Potential ',err_pot, &
00069         'Forces (x,y,z) ',errfx,errfy,errfz,'Average force',errf_ave
00070       write (60,'(a/a20,1pe13.6/a20,3(1pe13.6)/a20,1pe13.6)') 'Relative rms errors:','Potential ',err_pot, &
00071         'Forces (x,y,z) ',errfx,errfy,errfz,'Average force',errf_ave
00072   
00073       close(60)
00074       end subroutine error_test
00075
